about_the_game:
Ekoh 99 has been isolated for years, but a job posting for the mysterious planet’s new town planner brings you to this quaint tropical paradise. Your work is cut out for you. The town has been devastated by an evil Robot Rebellion, and the brilliant quantum scientist: Dr Terra has disappeared! Fulfil your destiny and rebuild the town, befriend its new citizens, bring the planet back to life, and uncover the lost secrets of Ekoh Beach as you return it to its former glory!

  • Rebuild the town of Ekoh Beach!  Ekoh Beach has seen better days and the Robot Rebellion left the town in ruins. Restore Ekoh Beach to its high-tech heyday with the help of some weird and wonderful hyper-quantum resources. There's no place like your new home but it sure is a mess! Most of the townspeople are gone and the old houses are either blasted by Rebelling Robots or just plain falling down! Start with a few humble houses then build bustling business like the inter-Dimensional bakery or MegaBrain Library. As the town grows and people return the projects get even more ambitious…how about a Quantum Mechanics or even a Spaceport!?



  • Make It Your Own! Build quick but basic houses to get started but upgrade to fancier dwellings like the RelaxoShack (patent pending) and EcoTropia as new material becomes available. Paint your houses just how you like them and plant some seasonal genetically enahanced flowers to put your stamp on the town. 

    Customize your character with different hairstyles and tshirts. You can even give the gift of a haircut to that special someone who probably doesnt want a haircut. (Nothing says I love you like a surprse haircut). Keep on customizin' throughout the game as new outfits become available.



  • Bring the Town Back to Life! Its not just houses, buildings and amenities that youre building! A town is nothing without its residents and Ekoh Beach is no different. Your new builds will encourage the new residents to move into restored homes. With over 35 unique NPCs to build relationships with, the town is sure to grow astronomically!



  • Run for Mayor. After building Ekoh Beach up from nothing, it can’t be that hard to convince the townspeople to vote for you to be their new mayor. Finally unlock those old Town Buildings spending your political capital on your next big building project!

  • Explore the Secrets of Ekoh Beach! While the Robot Rebellion is long past, echoes of it lurk deep beneath the town, and Dr. Terra’s lab is abandoned in the forest. Are you brave enough to investigate and solve the mysteries surrounding Ekoh Beach?

  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ekoh Beach has been destroyed by a nasty Robot Rebellion and is in urgent need of a new Town Planner! Your job? Get the town thriving again with your particle-harvesting skills and restore it back to its heyday. Collect resources, make friends, and solve the mystery of quantum scientist Dr Terra!

English*, German, Polish, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
